title: Polyfluorene–poly(ethylene oxide) diblock copolymers: synthesis and electron transport behavior
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23505-23510
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03606A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jin Cheng, Ruoyu Jiang, Yuhua Shan, Hong Sun, Shinji Kanehashi, Kenji Ogino
Polyfluorene–poly(ethylene oxide) diblock copolymers with shorter PEO chains (Mn = 1000 and 2000 g mol−1) enhance electron mobility due to increased crystallinity, outperforming both the homopolymer and longer-chain copolymers (Mn = 4000 g mol−1).
